ModMetaData.name: Trading Control
ModMetaData.author: Tad
ModMetaData.description:
Trading Control has expanded since it's first inception, being a simple place to direct traders, and stop them trampling over your colony!
Trading Control now allows you to manage your local Visitors and Traders more effectively. - Designate a Trading area around a simple trade marker. - Create a Marketplace stall and gain trading buffs for supporting these independant traders. - Designate Orbital Supply drop locations, so they at least go near your Colony! - Dismiss Traders and Visitors when you no longer want them around.
-------- Update 2025/09/03 -------------- I've been busy, this release has a lot of new features and improvements, exclusivley for 1.6. - Re-added original Dismiss functions so it applies to Traders and Visitors alike. - Added a Marketplace stall in place of the Trading Spot, allowing a more tailored experience if you want to build a dedicated trading area. This stall was designed and provided by Ailailou-fi, with my thanks! - Added a Mood Buff / Trade Buff to the Marketplace, to encourage protecting the traders. - Fixed the Orbital Drop Beacon, so it properly targets the designated drop zones. - Fixed a bunch of issues with the settings. - Made all of the above configurable in the Settings, to some degree. - Updated Japanese translations, with thanks to Proxyer for his continued work. - Refactored the entire codebase for improved performance and maintainability. -----------------------------------------
